bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: forEach of undefined when missing metadata
bug.description: The following error is thrown when executing a pipeline: <denchmark-code>UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot read property 'forEach' of undefined at ExecutePipeline.ExecuteJob.clearOldMetadata (/home/travis/build/[secure]-dev/[secure]/src/plugins/ExecuteJob/ExecuteJob.Metadata.js:199:45) </denchmark-code>
